metadata.name: F*ckin' Fruit Fly
metadata.description:
After a summer away from home, I returned home from camping to find a swarm of fruit flies that were relentless and seemed immortal. During my all out war against these spawns of satan, i was inspired to paint one, so here is that fuckin fruit fly that just won't die.

This 1 of 1 mint is redeemable for the physical painting:

 "Fuckin' Fruit Fly" | 12" x 12"  acrylic and spray paint on canvas |

 After purchase, contact me on [twitter](https://twitter.com/ih0dl

***IMPORTANT***  The collector has 90 days from the sale date to redeem physical painting. If the painting has not been redeemed within this timeframe, the collector forfeits rights to the physical work. This NFT will remain 1/1 and no copies will be made, however, I will list the physical painting for sale on my website if it is not claimed.

attributes.value: acrylic and spray paint on canvas
